raw_text: Cover Art  Transfiguration of Sergeant 05    Bryan Sola is a 20 year old multimedia arts student at the Asia Pacific College, Makati City, Philippines. Since childhood, he has been exploring and practicing different fields of art from traditional painting to digital arts. He finds digital painting the most rewarding. }}} By his graduation year, he was already one of the VFX artists of the Philippines' leading post production company, Roadrunner Network Philippines. He worked as a freelance matte painter/concept and layout artist and produced hyper-realism to stylized artworks. His work is now in great demand from VFX producers and film directors.
